name: NDTVUnofficial
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by NDTV, but you can listen to the top 5 stories and/ or cricket news from NDTV read by Alexa.

If you want to hear news from other sections, please leave a comment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
